CustomField.description: All employees are setup with a Salesforce Platform License by default. This gives employees access to the various Newmarket specific applications within Salesforce. Accessing Cases and Opportunities in Salesforce requires a Standard license which may need to be purchased.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: All employees are setup with a Salesforce Platform License by default. This gives employees access to the various Newmarket specific applications within Salesforce. Accessing Cases and Opportunities in Salesforce requires a Standard license
CustomField.label: Salesforce.com License Type
